column2: they had a small but good selection of brunch items
column3: along with brunch-food-themed tapas and pintxos.  Very clever.  The very best part of their brunch
column5: is the Bloody Mary Bar!  I was kind of blown away
column10: to mozzarella and salami on a stick as garnish
column11: to 5 different kinds of hot sauce.  I can't wait to go back for brunch.
